Reviews.Title: “Nice, brightly colored hotel”
Reviews.Author: PHeliks
Reviews.Content: stayed hacienda maria bonita week half trip yucatan location purposes excellent spent half vacation exploring mayan ruins nearby daytrips pdc half relaxing beach hotel close bus terminal couple hundred meters beach naturally stay beach hotel seaside location touristy pdc town build tourists example mexican clientele bit closer hotel clean brightly colored walls decorations ourselves found hotel peaceful couple stayed hotel night club claimed noise faced street didn´t disturbance courtyard hotel nice serene relaxing snack hacienda maria bonita experience definitely time visit yucatan hope won´t peninsula amazing destination travels

Reviews.Title: “The worst place in the Caribbean”
Reviews.Author: softy57
Reviews.Content: stayed playa 4 times caribbean 10 occasions worst dark mold smell noise night left 1 night booked hotel night till day pay 6 nts disputed credit card co manager talked phone agreed meet day didnt phone dump hard breathe nt rescue inhaler 4 people 25 party night deal

Reviews.Title: “Stink bathroom but perfect location for budget travel”
Reviews.Author: indie_dive
Reviews.Content: location hotel strategic budget trip stayed days playa del carmen hotel closed restaurants expensive fifth avenue scuba diving operators pubs bank atm supermarket oxxo takes 5 minutes walking beach fifth avenue breakfast okay spectacular wifi swimming pool hotel friendly front office staff issue bathroom stink complaint smell stayed 3 nights holidays paid advance tried cope

Reviews.Title: “Sounds like in the toilets of a night club!”
Reviews.Author: Archimedesrules
Reviews.Content: yes hotel located 5 mn shops beach bars restaurants etc yes relatively clean spacious looking pretty website staff helpful extravagant pool eh nicest beaches world lies 200 meters reason hotel infernal noise night althought paid advance week 3 completely sleepless nights headed hotel trying change twice building adjacent night club plays techno music 1045 pm 620 am volume increases 3am guess am precise hours usually relatively heavy sleep feel vibrations bass bed maybe concrete bed frame didnt help apart standard mildew smell maybe bit stronger elsewhere lived hard beds noisy ac plan party nonstop worth look heard deals elsewhere center playa short pricey absolutely recommend finding nicer block silent cleaner 23 price

Reviews.Title: “Great find for my vacation”
Reviews.Author: dmlandis
Reviews.Content: fine stay tastefully decorated colorful tile air conditioning cable equipped tv nice balcony overlooks pool pool clean refreshing day sun location 1 block avenida restaurant internet access lobby staff time helpful feel welcome definitely stay time cancun

Reviews.Title: “Best you can get for the price”
Reviews.Author: purpleskirt
Reviews.Content: bf budget backpacking mexico compared 5 hotels including ones lonely planet advices 3rd hotel stay definitely worth price service recommend family friends couples packed left people waiting front beach walking distance

HotelInfo.Name: Hacienda Maria Bonita
HotelInfo.Address: Avenue 10N, 215 between 10 y 12, Playa del Carmen 77710, Mexico
